name: Young Wind Dragon
movement: 90 ft. walking speed and 30 ft. flying speed
description: The Young Wind Dragon embodies the power of storms and winds, possessing a strong, streamlined body ideal for navigating turbulent skies.
memorable: Its ability to manipulate storm effects and its powerful breath attack make it a unique threat in combat.
goals: To exert its dominance over the skies and control the battlefield with wind and storm.
relations: Often encountered with other elemental creatures or dragons, possibly serving larger elemental powers.
environment: Typically found in stormy regions or mountainous areas where winds are strong.
strengths: Immunity to lightning damage and high mobility in combat make it a formidable opponent.
weaknesses: Resistance only to cold damage leaves it vulnerable to many other types of attacks.
attacks: The dragon can strike with powerful Bite and Claw attacks, delivering significant damage while leveraging its storm abilities.
most_powerful_ability: Tempest Breath unleashes a devastating blast of stormy wind, pushing enemies away and knocking them prone.
senses: It possesses blindsight out to 30 feet, allowing it to sense its surroundings without relying on sight.
skills: With high proficiency in Acrobatics, Intimidation, Perception, and Stealth, it is a versatile and agile creature.
additional_information: Has advantage on checks to escape restraints.
Sees through fog and precipitation without restriction.
Can manipulate battlefield conditions by extinguishing flames.
Exceptional physical attributes for a strong combat presence.
High passive perception for awareness of threats.
test_queries: powerful wind dragon with breath attack
